name: MongoDb To BigQuery CDC
description: A pipeline reads changestream from MongoDb and writes to BigQuery.

parameters.name: mongoDbUri
parameters.label: MongoDB Connection URI
parameters.helpText: URI to connect to MongoDb Atlas

parameters.name: database
parameters.label: MongoDB database
parameters.helpText: Database in MongoDB to read the collection. ex: my-db.

parameters.name: collection
parameters.label: MongoDB collection
parameters.helpText: Name of the collection inside MongoDB database. ex: my-collection.

parameters.name: outputTableSpec
parameters.label: output table spec
parameters.helpText: BigQuery destination table spec. e.g bigquery-project:dataset.output_table

parameters.name: inputTopic
parameters.label: input Pubsub Topic name
parameters.helpText: Topic Name to read from e.g. projects/<project-name>/topics/<topic-name>
